name: Hind-Sight
description:
Hind-Sight is an abstract game that represents how we make decisions and how we can chose a different path to get to the same outcome.

For each cube you collect a version of you , your former self will be created to walk the path you make. Will you cross paths with your past self and be overcome with indecision(and die) ? Or will you trek a new path and avoid your past decisions?  

Use of The Theme : 2020

There's a saying "Hindsight is always 20/20"  which means the paths taken are always clearer than the ones untraveled in our future.   

CONTROLS :

You can exit the game any time by hitting Escape on your keyboard or "O"/"B" on your controller
